overview: Sarah Anderson had no idea that when she left for a romantic getaway to the mountains with her husband that her life would be in jeopardy. After a brutal attack that leaves her fighting for her life, Sarah enlists the help of her best friend. Together they try to solve the mystery of who'd want her dead, while staying one step ahead of both the assailant and the sheriff. Along the way, they discover that everyone has a secret ... and some of them are deadly.
title: One Step Ahead
